content: Gedare Bloom Home Research Teaching CV Pubs Students Software Personal Gedare Bloom Associate Professor Director, Embedded Systems Security Lab Department of Computer Science University of Colorado at Colorado Springs gbloom at uccs edu Education Ph.D., Computer Science, The George Washington University, 2013 M.S., Computer Science, The George Washington University, 2012 B.S., Computer Science and Mathematics, Michigan Technological University, 2005 Research I investigate security problems in real-time embedded systems and apply solutions across the hardware-software interface. My research has been supported by federal grants from the National Science Foundation, Department of Homeland Security, National Security Agency, and Office of Naval Research, and by industry gifts from Northrop Grumman, Texas Instruments, Leidos, and Xilinx.
